page.title: 02Crossens Rose Queen Festival
page.content: On Saturday,June 22nd.our 56th.Rose Queen festival was held.The first festival was in 1906 and the festival was held every year exept 1915,1918 until 1964 when Liz Leaf was crowned queen.It seemed fitting when we decided to bring back our festival that Liz,now Mrs.Highton,should be asked to crown Queen Philippa.Every child in the school took part in the festival. First came the procession round Crossens village,the village weding,nursery rhymes and fairy stories represented by the infants.Then a tribe of Indians followed by the band.The Queen was next followed by the Maypole Dancers and the assorted fancy dress. The first item on the field was the village wedding.It was our turn to do
